name: Classic
description: A well-rounded set of party prompts

prompts.text: %s, take a drink!
%s and %s, cheers and drink together!
%s, tell an embarrassing story or take 2 drinks
%s, give out 3 drinks to anyone you choose
%s and %s, thumb war! Loser drinks
%s, do your best impression of another player. They drink if they can't guess who!
Everyone who has a pet, take a drink!
%s, compliment %s or take 2 drinks
%s, name 5 movies in 10 seconds or drink!
Everyone drink!
Waterfall! %s starts, everyone drinks until the person before them stops
Categories! %s picks a category. Go around naming items. First to fail drinks!
Rhyme Time! %s says a word. Go around rhyming. First to fail drinks!
Never Have I Ever! %s starts. Anyone who has done it drinks!
%s, switch drinks with %s for this round
%s, no talking until your next turn! Break it and drink twice!
Little Green Man! Everyone must remove an invisible man from their drink before sipping!
prompts.secondary: The Little Green Man has left! You can drink normally again.

prompts.text: %s, make a rule. Anyone who breaks it drinks!
%s asks %s a question. Wrong answer = drink!
Last person to touch their nose drinks!
